q-repo.name: Q Repo
q-repo.description: Contains apps made or commissioned by Q Music Player AB (https://qmusicplayer.com).

q-repo-official.name: Q Official Repo
q-repo-official.description: Contains 3rd party apps published by verified (by us) legal entities.

q-repo-unofficial.name: Q Unofficial Repo
q-repo-unofficial.description: Contains 3rd party apps published by anyone without any verification or restriction. Apps here may blow up the world.
